title: Script faces?
content:
This is for my wedding invites. I'm using a lot of aqua-cyan, cherry red and it has a kind of retro mid-century japan look.

Can you recommend a script? Not so much Bickham or Shelley or Zapfino, but more like Notec, Honey or Emmascript? Or this, what's this in the 4th image?

thanks!  
Jennifer

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820im_/http:/typophile.com/files/notec_4022.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820im_/http:/typophile.com/files/honey_5609.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820im_/http:/typophile.com/files/emmascript_4869.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820im_/http:/typophile.com/files/unknown_3822.png)
author: Jennifer

comments.content:
i think the last one is Dear Sarah?

Some faves:  
 [Bounce Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000310)  
 [Lakeside](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/lakeside.html)  
 [Bistro Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/suitcase/bistroscript_regular/)  
 [Sacre Bleu](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/mvb_fonts/mvb_sacre_bleu/)  
 [Olciana](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820/http:/www.type.co.uk/index.php?p=a_to_z_listing&category=&supplier=18&filetype=&search=olicana)

Or, okay Honeyscript makes it look like a shoe ad. So not that.

How about something fussy-quirky? Like filosofia?
Paul, these are great. Olicana is amazing.

Good picks from Paul. Also [Swank](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/swank/), [Handsome](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/shinntype/handsome_pro_ot/).

Fussy-quirky: [Kursivschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/kursivschrift_virtual/)

And congrats on the wedding!

it is. it's one of those i wish i had made!

like Filosofia? Try one of the styles of [Danubia](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516141820/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=danubia) i especially love the script version.

ooh Stephen, swank is really neat!  
thank you thank you.  
mostly the wedding industrial complex thanks another 2 fools and their credit cards. :)

danubia script definitely fussy quirky.  
i love this place, i learn so much.
